attributes.action: Set Time Limits on distribution centres loading/unloading commercial vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: Distribution centres are a law unto themselves. It’s common to lose several hours of your working day in these warehouses loading & unloading. Set a 1 hour limit to assist the #DriverShortage and to stop drivers bearing the brunt and compromising safety by increasing work load. Other countries have limits, so should we.
attributes.background: Instead of putting more work on already overworked drivers bring in Legislation to drastically reduce loading/unloading times at distribution centres to free up thousands of more vehicles and help solve the #DriverShortage
